intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander. Withdraw your troops.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Corrin... Don't tell me you're siding with Hoshido.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm afraid so. I've made up my mind---I stand with Hoshido.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I fear the Hoshidans might try to brainwash you... I am well aware of your Hoshidan lineage. It is true that we lack common blood. But still, we've treated you as kin since the very day you arrived in Nohr. No matter what anyone says, you are my brother/sister, Corrin. I know that Camilla, Leo, and Elise feel the same way. And Father will forgive you. I know it. You are of Nohr! Return to us, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm sorry. I can't go back. King Garon is a coward and a liar. I've witnessed enough of his destruction. Causing an explosion in a crowded city center with no regard for innocent life. That's the action of a madman.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Tell me. If King Garon thinks of me as family... how could he have orchestrated this attack? I could have easily been killed along with Queen Mikoto. The truth is that I was just a pawn. Collateral damage. King Garon was willing to sacrifice my life in pursuit of his agenda. Face it, Xander---Garon is no longer human. He's pure evil.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Father... evil? How could you say that, little prince/princess?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander, please... Join me! Join me and help put an end to his cruelty!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Corrin...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: There's my answer, traitor.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Traitor? Brother, wait!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Enough. I never thought you would turn your back on your kingdom and your family. Your betrayal will not be forgiven. You want to side with Hoshido? Fine. Over my dead body!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You have been deceived, Brother/Sister. They've clearly brainwashed you. I will not rest until I've returned you to your senses. Get up! Get up and return to Nohr with me. Surely there's some part of you that still remembers your true family.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Brother, my mind is made up.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: If that's the case... I will end this quickly.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Wait!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Just try it, Nohrian scum.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Ryoma! Please, we can settle this peacefully.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: What's wrong, Corrin? Lost your focus? Tossing your sword aside and dying as a martyr won't do us any good.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Fiend! If you seek to take my brother/sister from me, I won't go easy on you.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Oh, why don't you spare ME the chitchat? Shut up and attack, if you dare!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: A splendid idea. I've yearned to introduce you to a dear friend of mine---the dark blade Siegfried! Camilla, Leo, Elise! Are you ready?

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Darling, I was born ready. Let's kill them all quickly so that we can make it in time for Corrin's nap.

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: You're coming with us---that's all there is to it. Understood, Corrin?

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Yay! We're gonna take Corrin back home!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Please. Corrin has made his/her choice. All that remains is to spill your blood and wipe my divine sword clean. Hinoka, Takumi, Sakura! Steel yourselves.

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: I'll be your shield, Corrin. They won't kidnap you again.

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Stupid Nohrian jerks! I'll kill all of you!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: I'm r-ready. I won't let them hurt you, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Very well. All forces, attack!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Warriors of Hoshido... prepare for battle!

intro.speaker: Felicia
intro.line: I made it Lord Corrin! Is everything OK?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Felicia? No, we're far from OK. But there's no time to explain. Your timing is terrible. What are you doing here now?

intro.speaker: Felicia
intro.line: How can you say that? I've been looking for you all this time! Anyway, I'm here now, and I'll stand by your side!

intro.speaker: Jakob
intro.line: Pardon me, Lady Corrin. It took me a while to track you down. Is everything OK?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Jakob? No, we're far from OK. But there's no time to explain right now. Your timing is terrible. What are you doing here now?

intro.speaker: Jakob
intro.line: I apologize. I've been searching for you this whole time. Regardless, I'm here now, and I'll stand by your side.

boss.speaker: Elise
boss.line: I never thought this could happen...

boss.speaker: Elise
boss.line: Why are you doing this, Corrin? I don't want to fight you! Why don't you stop all this and come home with us?

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I'm so sorry, Elise. The last thing I want to do is fight you. I know it's hard to understand, but this is the only way!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Is this really our future? A lifetime of conflict with Nohr?

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Corrin... I can understand why you are reluctant to fight. If it would make you feel better, you can leave the fighting to me and Ryoma.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: No. Burying my head in the sand won't change the reality of the situation. I will stand with you, and the rest of Hoshido.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I know this is the right choice. Even if it's the hardest one I've ever had to make. I have to believe this is the path that will eventually lead to peace.
